uid.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

title.description: The title of the chat session, often the first user message.

createdAt.description: The server timestamp when the chat was created.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this chat.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: A single message within a chat session.

text.description: The content of the chat message.

createdAt.description: The server timestamp when the message was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information for each user.

/users/{userId}/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores all chat sessions for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/chats/{chatId}/messages/.description: Stores all messages for a specific chat session.
